thread.title: Body found in hunt for missing paramedic who went out for morning run and never came home
thread.title_full: Body found in hunt for missing paramedic who went out for morning run and never came home

author: Jessica Haworth
title: Body found in hunt for missing paramedic who went out for morning run and never came home

organizations.name: greater and south western ambulance foundation trust

text:
News Body found in hunt for missing paramedic who went out for morning run and never came home The family of 51-year-old David Skeen have been informed of the find in the Talgarth area of the Brecon Beacons in mid-Wales Share David Skeen went missing on his morning run (Photo: Dyfed Powys Police) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A body has been found by a search team looking for a missing runner, police said. 
The family of 51-year-old David Skeen have been informed of the find in the Talgarth area of the Brecon Beacons in mid-Wales, Dyfed-Powys Police said. 
Mr Skeen, who had recently moved to Talgarth from Bristol, was last seen in that area on Tuesday after going for a run. 
A police spokesman said: "A body has been found in the Talgarth area, near Brecon, during the search for missing male David Skeen. 
"(The) body (is) not yet formally ID'd but family are aware of the development. No further information is available at this time. Thanks to the public and all who searched." Police are still searching for Mr Skeen (Photo: Dyfed Powys Police) Police have searched for him (Photo: Dyfed Powys Police) 
Bristol-born Mr Skeen was a paramedic when he lived there, reports the Bristol Post. Read More Police investigating mystery death of British airline worker who died after starting dream job in Amsterdam 
His former colleagues from Greater and South Western Ambulance Foundation Trust had shared an appeal to find him. 
One wrote: "Dave your (sic) missed....get in touch if you can, anyone who knows me please share he is our work colleague" Dyfed Powys Police posted photos of David Skeen, who is missing (Photo: Dyfed Powys Police) 
He is described as being of slim build, five foot, eight inches tall and has short brown hair. 
Anyone with information is asked to call Dyfed-Powys Police on 101. Like us on Facebook
